name: Call Of The Stars
description:
30-6-14

Update to 1.1:

Added 1 player mode.

Galaxy far far away is golden star born!

Two of our friends heard the call of the stars.

Both friends would love to have the gold star.

They want to be first at the gold star.

Then the battle between the two friends begins.

During their journey to the gold star.

Call Of The Star!

Is a two player game.

A battle that at first comes the gold star.

In each level you have to try to shoot one another.

If you gat hit you lose one life.

If you lose all lives, has, your oppenent has won.

Then you go on to the next level.

Version 1.1:

30-06-2014

Added 1 player mode.

Fixed some sound.
